Draft Total Value Rating: 93
Jim Paxson ranks in the 34th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Paxson's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 4 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:

Some of their biggest busts:

  • Drafted Trajan Langdon with 11th pick but was worth 21th pick.
